actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Joint resolution to amend an Act entitled "To authorize certain appropriations for the territories of the United States, to amend certain Acts relating thereto, and for other purposes" (enrolled bill H.R. 6550, Ninety-fifth Congress, first session).

summary.text: Provides that those laws which provide Federal services and financial assistance programs, and the Federal Banking laws as they apply to Guam, shall apply to Guam and the Virgin Islands on the same terms and conditions as they shall be applied to the Northern Mariana Islands once the Covenant to Establish a Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in Political Union with the United States of America goes into effect.

titles.title: A joint resolution to amend an Act entitled "To authorize certain appropriations for the territories of the United States, to amend certain Acts relating thereto.

Joint resolution to amend an Act entitled "To authorize certain appropriations for the territories of the United States, to amend certain Acts relating thereto, and for other purposes" (enrolled bill H.R. 6550, Ninety-fifth Congress, first session).
